text: Baluna, â€˜allaha ya icche karena ta chara amara nijera bhalo mandera upara'o amara kono adhikara ne'i. Ami yadi gayebera khabara janatama tabe to ami aneka kalyana'i labha karatama ebam kono akalyana'i amake sparsa karata na. Imanadara sampradayera jan'ya satarkakari o susambadadata chara ami to ara kichu'i na'i [1].â€™
